mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( B_NO, M_NO, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, M_ID ) VALUES( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{m_no}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{m_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_VIEWCNT = B_VIEWCNT+1 WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE B_NO = (SELECT MAX(B_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE B_NO < #{b_no})
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE B_NO = (SELECT MIN(B_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE B_NO > #{b_no})

choose.when: WHERE (M_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B_CONTENT LIKE LOWER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR B_CONTENT LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR B_TITLE LIKE LOWER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR B_TITLE LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )
choose.otherwise: WHERE (${searchOption} LIKE LOWER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR ${searchOption} LIKE UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
